transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ravindra ji Shubham baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se boloji.
Customer: Bolo ji.
Executive: Ji sir bataiye aapne customer care pe call kiya tha abhi.
Customer: Haan ji koi refund ke bare mein baat karna chah raha tha kya raha uska kuch bataya ki.
Executive: Pranshu.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Sir bataya tha sir refund ka sir wo mana kar rahe hain jo team thi jinhone aapko sale kiya tha bol rahe hain ki refund to humne commit hi nahi kiya.
Customer: Nahi dekho aisa hai ke mere paas recording mili nahi hai.
Customer: Ab usme aap jo marzi kaho lekin ab ye kaho ke meri baat nahi hai baat meri hui hai.
Customer: Ab wohi hai mere ko properly maine unse bhi aapse kaha tha shayad Pranshu se baat hui thi ab Pranshu hi the jahan tak mere ko lag raha hai mere commit ke jo kara Pranshu ne hi kara hai ab ye zaruri nahi hai ke mere whatsapp pe bhi baat hui ho kaisi par hua hai ab mere paas hota to abhi doodh ka doodh pani ka pani ho jata ab main yahan par thoda samarth ho dene mein main dhundha tha bahut par mere ko mila nahi kyunki maine save do teen logon ka number save kara wo alag alag number pata nahi.
Executive: Ravindra ji.
Customer: Ravindra ji.
Executive: Sir service use to kariye aap use bhi nahi kar rahe hain sir use karke dekhiye to aap bina use kare sir service ko perception pe kharab bata rahe hain sir aapki industry mein log aur bhi to business le rahe hain ek cheez mujhe bataiye sir aapne paise business ke liye diye hain aap business to kar nahi rahe ho use to kar nahi rahe ho aap ek aapne kuch 10 12 buylead consume kari aap sirf perception ko leke keh rahe hain ki yaar bekar hai sir 10 12 lead mein agar fir to sir ek cheez mujhe bataiye aapne dukan kholi kisi market mein wahan pe 10 log aaye 10 logon ne kharida nahi keval rate puch ke chale gaye to market kharab thodi hai.
Customer: Aur koi baat batao fir main aapko batata hun.
Executive: Wahi wali baat ho gayi na sir.
Customer: Aur koi baat aapki baat puri ho gayi.
Executive: Haan ji please ho gayi bataiye.
Customer: To mera kehne ka matlab maine aapko kuch aur bhi bataya tha ke yaad ho shayad aapko ke jo kaam maine apne bache ko karana tha usne mana kar diya karne ke liye wo aath daswi kar chuka 11vi padh raha tha usne padhai ke liye mana kar diya tha maine ye kaam usko karaya tha main karta hun naukri.
Executive: Accha ye aapne mujhe nahi bataya.
Customer: Ab wo keh raha hai ye aapne mujhe nahi bataya.
Customer: Ab bhul gaye hoge shayad nahi ho sakta naam bataya ho kaiyon se baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: To ye kya hai maine usko kar diya hai bandak wo service ka koi fayda nahi main naukri karunga ya ye kaam sambhalunga to chance nahi hai.
Executive: Accha aap kahan pe job karte hain sir.
Customer: Main job karta hun Action Source company mein jo teri company Action Source suna hoga purana naam.
Executive: Haan haan wo purani company hai sir.
Customer: Haan ji isi mein main HR hun.
Executive: Usi mein HR ho.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: To maine kya hai ye paise maine bache ke liye lagaye the bache ne thoda sa tevar dikhana chaha main padh nahi raha hun kuch aaj kal pata hai 10 11 15 16 17 saal ke bache na nakhre dikhane lagte hain to padh nahi raha to kaam kar tere kaam khulwa deta hun to fir kya raha ke usne jab humne usko paisa dala yahan baat karni hai yahan baat karni hai is tarike se mana to usko aur zyada sir dardi lagne lagi jab usko data to kehne mein padhai karunga ab main kaha tu idhar paise mere lagwa diye subscription bhi le liya dukan bhi le li ghar se bhi aagaya ab wo keh raha hai padhai karega yaar to pura wohi hai uski mummy bolti hai ke yaar bacha hai kyun dat rahe ho wo baat yahan par aagayi ab mal yahan se liya maine loss mein wapas kiya fir dusri party ko diya dukan chhod di ya to main dusra banda bithaunga us jagah pe ab kitna kya kuch karta hai itni sir dardi leta nahi leta.
Executive: Sir ye sabhi EPF compliances hain payroll services HR consultancy service ye service sir aap actually provide kar rahe the.
Customer: Haan ye karta hun na main main naukri bhi karta hun mera office bhi hai yahan par maine do bande bhi chhod rakhe hain.
Executive: To unme se koi nahi dekh sakta.
Customer: Nahi wo sir alag line ke hain wo is line mein kaise deal kar sakte hain main rasoi banane rasoi ka khana banane wale ko bol rahe ho ke aap to jaake train chalao wo wali baat ho jayegi na.
Executive: Sir kya chah rahe hain aap mujhe bataiye Ravindra ji refund pe.
Customer: Main refund chah raha hun kyunki aaj ki date mein to situation hai nahi hai agar bhavishya mein chaha ke naukri wagera rahi rahi nahi rahi to us case mein main sochunga ke haan chalo aisa usko chhod ke isme hum join kar lete hain isko aage badhate hain ki apna kaam apna hi hota hai lekin recent ki jo situation hai na abhi saal che mahine tak mere ko dikh raha hai ke main isko chhod kar ke usme nahi ja sakta kyunki itna profit usme ek dam se hoga nahi balki main ye do teen mahine ka kaam hai jo maine chalu kara hai aur wo mere ko saal bhar khana hai bache bhi palne hain.
Executive: Sir refund policy hai nahi hai kaise karwaun sir refund aur aap man lo aap hamari service deactivate kar doge hum service use nahi karenge to fir is paise ka aap rakh kar ke karoge bhi kya aap ye bhi to socho na.
Customer: Sir baat to theek hai baat to theek hai lekin ek cheez batao sir bar bar matlab samajhiye sir service deactivation ka process hota to main refund ka koi process hota main karwa hi deta chaliye main ek bar baat karke batata hun aapko main senior se baat karwata hun apne theek hai.
Customer: Baat karo agar isko khatam karo itna lamba nahi sakte na kyunki udhar udhar se paisa utha kar ke humne usme lagaya aur pata lage ke ab sir lene ke liye wapas to badi dikkat ho rahi hai kyunki aisa hi baatein na pata badi badi company nahi karti dekho jahan tak main samajh pa raha hun aap mere ko trustee hain aur main aapse koi paisa le lu kisi kaam ke liye wo kaam na ho baad mein to nahi paise nahi milte sir to thoda sa ajeeb to lagta hai.
Executive: Kaam ho gaya hai sir kaam to ho gaya hai service chal rahi hai humne kaha se bola unhone bola single customer maine single aapne recording suni hogi mere ko single customer chahiye ek mahine mein udhar se ek call banda aisa nahi aayega jisko zarurat ho usne mere ko dhuna ho ke call kari bhai sahab maine aapka mal dekha hai mere ko chahiye 10 15 logon ko maine apne taraf se call kara.
Executive: Sir 10 15 ko kam kiya hai na zyada ko karna tha aapko but ab aap wahi baat bata rahe hain ye aapke maa baith ke nahi ab man lo 10 15 ko main zyada bhi kara to aap mere ko ab ye batao main theek hai main ab aur rok leta hun ek do mahine main per day ek do ko karta hun ab aap kya guarantee dete hain kitne customer milenge.
Executive: Guarantee to kuch nahi hai sir.
Customer: To fir wohi baat aagayi na sir yahan isme nahi hai to usme bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Chaliye rukiye sir main ek bar aap senior se baat karke aapko clarification karwata hun usko khatam karao aise chalta nahi hai na kyunki wo hai na bhavishya mein bhi paisa lagane ke liye na aadmi darne lagta hai sir to naukri aaj kal aap samajh rahe ho kitne din ki hai koi pata nahi hai aaj hamari ban rahi hai to kar rahe hain kal ko nahi bani to nahi hai to fir tab bhi kuch sochna padega jab aaj hamari situation aap hamari ye kar doge to hum dobara to sochenge bhi nahi.
Executive: Chaliye rukiye.
Customer: Koi banda kahin kaam karta hai 10 din kaam karta hai 10 din ke paise mil jate hain to dobara aane ka man karta hai chalo wo banda theek hai jitne kaam kara paise de diye hamare aur agar nahi nahi sahab 10 din ke paise hi nahi milte to wo to fir wahan jayega nahi na.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir samajh gaya Ravindra ji ek bar baat karke dekho mere ko batao aur fir agar wo ye kehte hain ki nahi ab roz do logon ko call karke tumhare ko har mahine customer milenge panch che do milenge ek milega to fir wo bhi hum karke dekhte hain par lekin ab hamare commitment karoge haan milega aapko.
Executive: Main batata hun sir aapko.
Customer: Kitni der mein bataoge.
Executive: Main 3:30 ho rahe hain sir 4:30 tak bata deta hun ek ghante ke andar aapko.
Customer: Theek hai batana mere ko jo bhi positive response hai na nahi to fir baki baad mein main fir wo banda mere ko aur double nuksan ho jayega ye to wapas sara mal wapas mera dukan hatai fir banda tainat karunga to jitna mera lagaya usse zyada nuksan dunga aur totally maine personal loan lekar paisa lagaya.
Executive: Samajh gaya sir personal loan leke lagaya tha samajh sakta hun main theek hai dijiye aap thoda sa time mujhe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund due to business situation.

- Service not useful; child not pursuing business.

- Expresses concern about future investments.



Resolution:

- Executive will discuss refund with senior.

- Executive will call back in one hour.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call back with update.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business, job, personal loan
